i would ask for some type of legally binding document that can be traced to him.what makes him sure that the blade is authentic?has it been appraised?ask more info.

Kee Curlee <threekeys@...> wrote:
Guys,  This bum has sent me pictures, paper work, all kinds of documentation
and etc. now,  I asked him to send the sword for inspection,   now the game
gets bad. He tells me he needs money to send the sword for inspection, Now
this jamoke starts trying to bargain with this old country Mick... Bad plan.
Kee (Irish) Curlee...
